participant_1.background:
I like lizards.
I draw during classes instead of taking notes.
I wish i could live in a fantasy world.
I do not have many friends.
I have long hair for a boy.

participant_2.background:
My parents used to work in politics , until they discovered the goodness within themselves.
I am a really , really good guitar player.
I enjoy john gresham movies , but not his books.
My girlfriend tells me she is going to leave me almost every day.

content.text: I wish I could live in a fantasy world too. It would be so cool to have adventures and meet all sorts of interesting creatures.
I know, right? It would be amazing. I've always been fascinated by fantasy worlds.
Me too. I love reading books and watching movies about them.
Me too. I'm actually a really big fan of John Gresham's books.
Me too! I love his books. They're so well-written and the characters are so relatable.
I know, right? I love the way he creates these amazing worlds that you can get lost in.
Me too. I wish I could live in one of his worlds.
Me too. It would be so much fun.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar. I've been playing for about 10 years now.
Oh, that's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
You should! It's really fun. I could teach you if you want.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw. I've been drawing since I was a kid.
Oh, that's cool. I like drawing too.
